description.value: Sha’er Khan grants you the weapon Agniastra gifted to him by his brother-God, Agni, for defeating Eldrazor in honorable combat while protecting a foreign goddess; or so the legend claims, to the hatred of the Elves — especially the Dark Elves of Naggaroth. Agniastra is a celestial weapon that falls from the heavens into one of your open hands. It is a Magical sword that has a Damage equal to your Fellowship Bonus. The first time an enemy is struck by the sword they suffer +SL @Condition[Ablaze] Conditions. Further hits add no additional @Condition[Ablaze] Conditions to the same target. When discharged, it emits flames inextinguishable through normal means. Foes suffering from @Condition[Ablaze] Conditions caused by Agniastra cannot have them removed until the Miracle ends. You must be outdoors to perform this Miracle but may use the sword indoors once it is summoned.
